text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After school, I start looking for Scarlet<n>so we can get a head
start on today's<n>training.

text_block_list.name: Teacher A
text_block_list.text:
Sorry for making you help me out all<n>day. You were a big
help though, so I<n>appreciate it.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Not at all, I'm just happy I was able<n>to assist. Feel free to
rely on me<n>whenever you need!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: And with that, I'll be off!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Sigh. They've been running meragged since morning... Gotta preparefor training now, too—

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Eek?! T-Trainer?! Don't scare me like<n>that!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
...Geez, did you come here just to get<n>me? Well, you could
have saved<n>yourself the effort! I was about to<n>head over
anyway.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
And just so we're clear—I wasn't<n>tired at all. It was just
your<n>imagination, a trick of the light.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Helping people out is kinda like an<n>everyday thing for me.
It's not a big<n>deal.
choice_data_list:
As long as you aren't pushing yourself too hard,
okay?

As long as you aren't pushing yourself too hard,
okay?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I know, I know. You might've<n>forgotten, but I'm an honor
student.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
I'm more dependable than anyone<n>else, and I never betray
their<n>expectations. Whether it's my<n>conduct, my studies,
or my<n>running—I'm number one.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
That's who Daiwa Scarlet is! So a<n>few errands aren't
enough to faze<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Instead of prying into my private life,<n>how about you focus
on my training?
choice_data_list: Didn't I say I would support you?
Didn't I say I would support you?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Y-you did say that when you scouted<n>me... But didn't you
mean "support" in<n>the racing sense?!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Even then... You don't need to worryabout me this m—

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Hey Scarlet! Got a minute?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Ah... Wh-what's the matter?<n>Something wrong?

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text:
I have to prepare the cooking utensils<n>for tomorrow's home
ec class. Sorry,<n>but could you help me real quick?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Sure, I don't mind! I'll be right there,<n>so could you go on
ahead without me?

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Yay, thanks a bunch! I'm glad I asked<n>you! I'll be waiting!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Sorry Trainer, but you should go on<n>ahead too.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
It's fine, I got this. And it's not that I<n>don't want you with
me—I just don't<n>want to push my work onto others.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
So off you go! Get prepped for me<n>training! I won't take
long, okay?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Scarlet promptly shoos me away.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Thirty minutes later...

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Sigh... That took way longer thanI thought it would. Okay, let's getstarted.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
...Huh, what's wrong? Why're you<n>staring daggers at me...
Are you mad?<n>I do feel bad for making you wait, you<n>
know.
choice_data_list:
I'm worried you're taking on too much by
yourself.

I'm worried you're taking on too much by
yourself.

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
N-not even close! Besides, if I can't<n>even do this much, how
am I<n>supposed to be number one?

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: I know I was late, so let's just train<n>longer to make up for—
choice_data_list: You can rely on me more!
You can rely on me more!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
What the heck... You're making me<n>look like the bad guy
here, you know?!

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text: Also... you are my trainer, so I... d-do<n>r—

text_block_list.name: Daiwa Scarlet
text_block_list.text:
Ahhh, never mind! Now I'm in a bad<n>mood! Let's just hurry
up and start<n>training!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Daiwa Scarlet—a student set on being<n>number one. It looks
like it'll take a lot<n>more time before she learns to count<n>on
me.
